review_body: Good for listening to over the air radio if you can't get a signal or are out of town. App often shuts off sound for no reason. Promos for a free trial of their premium service are annoying. I unwillingly signed up for a 14-day trial when I tried to hit the x to get rid of it and was never able to u...Full ReviewGood for listening to over the air radio if you can't get a signal or are out of town. App often shuts off sound for no reason. Promos for a free trial of their premium service are annoying. I unwillingly signed up for a 14-day trial when I tried to hit the x to get rid of it and was never able to use it anyway, so I can't comment on the premium service, only the free one.

BUT, the one thing that ticks me off more than anything is songs comming up on my saved songs that i didn't save and cant stand to listen to. I can't remove them and can't afford to pay for the app. For this reason i give 4 stars.

Honestly one of the most misleading apps. All the advertisements on the radio in the car said "Play whatever song you want for FREE!". This sounded too good to be true! All the advertisements on the radio in the car said "Play whatever song you want for FREE!". This sounded too good to be true! 'How could this possibly go wrong?' I thought. Then I opened it up. See, remember when they said it was free to play any song? Well, it's actually the PODCASTS that are free, not the songs. To play whatever song you want, you have to buy either Plus ($4.99 a month) or All Access ($10.99 a month). I guess I'm going back to YT.
